Los candidatos al 10-N en Cataluña
Arrimadas carga contra Sanchis (TV3): "Lo primero que haremos será cesarlo"
06 Nov 2019, 05:18 by La Información

La candidata de Cs, Cayetana Álvarez de Toledo (PP) e Ignacio Garriga (Vox) arremeten contra la televisión pública catalana en un debate.

Inés Arrimadas (Cs), Cayetana Álvarez de Toledo (PP) e Ignacio Garriga (Vox) han arremetido este martes contra TV3 en el debate televisivo de candidatos al 10-N en Cataluña, organizado por la televisión pública catalana.
El debate, moderado por el director de la cadena, Vicent Sanchis, ha arrancado con los reproches que Arrimadas y Álvarez de Toledo ya le dirigieron en el celebrado justo antes de las elecciones del 28A.
Arrimadas ha acusado a TV3 de ser una "maquinaria de propaganda" y ha ofrecido a Sanchis, de nuevo, una "carta de dimisión": "No nos haga esperar al 155, que lo primero que haremos será cesarlo", le ha advertido, a lo que el director de TV3 ha replicado que, como moderador, no le podía contestar.



A continuación ha sido Álvarez de Toledo quien ha cargado contra la cadena pública catalana: "Han construido una secta", ha denunciado. "Yo he dudado si venir hoy", ha asegurado la candidata del PP, que ha explicado que finalmente ha decidido quedarse en el plató de Sant Joan Despí (Barcelona) "por respeto democrático a los catalanes".
Además, ha quitado varios lazos amarillos de las instalaciones de la televisión catalana que ha encontrado a su paso. 



Por su parte, Garriga ha denunciado que TV3 fue un "altavoz de propaganda" en el "golpe de Estado" del 1-O y, con la aplicación del artículo 155 de la Constitución, "debería haberse cerrado, intervenido de manera inmediata". En este punto, ha reprochado a PP y Cs que ahora "hablen de intervenir" TV3, pese a que en 2017 "no lo hicieron con el 155".

The 10-N candidates in Catalonia
Armed charge against Sanchis (TV3): "The first thing we will do is stop it"
06 Nov 2019, 05:18 by The Information

The candidate of Cs, Cayetana Álvarez de Toledo (PP) and Ignacio Garriga (Vox) lash out against Catalan public television in a debate.

Inés Arrimadas (Cs), Cayetana Álvarez de Toledo (PP) and Ignacio Garriga (Vox) have attacked this Tuesday against TV3 in the television debate of 10-N candidates in Catalonia, organized by Catalan public television.
The debate, moderated by the director of the chain, Vicent Sanchis, has started with the reproaches that Arrimadas and Álvarez de Toledo already directed him at the one held just before the 28A elections.
Arrimadas has accused TV3 of being a "propaganda machine" and has offered Sanchis, again, a "letter of resignation": "Do not make us wait for 155, the first thing we will do is stop it," he warned, to which the director of TV3 has replied that, as a moderator, he could not answer.



Then it was Álvarez de Toledo who has charged against the Catalan public chain: "They have built a sect," he denounced. "I have doubted whether to come today," said the PP candidate, who explained that she has finally decided to stay on the set of Sant Joan Despí (Barcelona) "for democratic respect for the Catalans."
In addition, he has removed several yellow ties from the Catalan television facilities he has found in his path.



For his part, Garriga has denounced that TV3 was a "propaganda speaker" in the "coup d'etat" of 1-O and, with the application of article 155 of the Constitution, "should have been closed, intervened immediately." At this point, he has reproached PP and Cs that now "talk about" TV3, although in 2017 "they didn't do it with 155".
